writer.name: 蒂埃里·克里法 Thierry Klifa

director.name: 蒂埃里·克里法 Thierry Klifa

introduction: Germany, 90s. Dora, a strange and secretive young woman, has just had a child with Albert when she goes to France, taking her son with her. She wants to make a career in cinema. Years later Dora became a successful actress, she is well-known in the theater, she continues the movies, but her relationship has been distended with her son, he has spent more and more time in the street and gets lost in a gear of dope and petty crime. To regain her son, and regain some peace, Dora will have to reconnect with her past and finally confront her ghosts.
